title: Seed runner and main function
description: Implement `app/seed/run.py` with async main() function. Import all seed functions. Drop all tables via Base.metadata.drop_all(), then recreate via Base.metadata.create_all(). Create async session and call seed functions in order: seed_skills, seed_users, seed_projects, seed_tribes, seed_feed_events. Commit session. Print success message. Add `if __name__ == '__main__': asyncio.run(main())` entrypoint. Make module runnable via `python -m app.seed.run`.
acceptance_criteria:
- run.py drops and recreates all tables
- Calls all seed functions in correct order
- Handles async session properly
- Commits at end
- Prints success message
- Runnable via `python -m app.seed.run`
- Idempotent (can run multiple times)
